abstract: Allows the enumeration of all the table rows that are known to the table view.
overview:
## Discussion

The enumeration includes all views in the [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSView/visibleRect]; however, it may also include ones that are “in flight” due to animations or other attributes of the table.

It is preferred to use this method to efficiently make changes over all views that exist in the table.

# enumerateAvailableRowViews(_:)

**Instance Method**

Allows the enumeration of all the table rows that are known to the table view.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor func enumerateAvailableRowViews(_ handler: (NSTableRowView, Int) -> Void)
```

## Parameters

- **handler**: The `Block` to apply to elements in the set.

The `Block` takes two arguments:



## Discussion

The enumeration includes all views in the [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSView/visibleRect]; however, it may also include ones that are “in flight” due to animations or other attributes of the table.

It is preferred to use this method to efficiently make changes over all views that exist in the table.
title: enumerateAvailableRowViews(_:)
